component.refId: Package\Debitos Creditos Manuales AMS\OLE DB Destination
component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SqlServer v10; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property:
SELECT 'A' as Origen_Refacturacion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_TIPR AS Tipo_Acreedor, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, W_V550_TALO AS Nro_Talonario, W_V550_TCOM AS Tipo_Comprobante, W_V550_NCOM AS Numero_Comprobante, W_V550_FCOM AS Fecha_Comprobante, W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, (CASE when W_V550_TCOM = 'CMAN' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, 1 as marca_procesado, (CASE when (W_V550_NPRO = 74902 or W_V550_NPRO = 53945 or W_V550_NPRO = 74134) then 'A' else 'X' end) as id_origen_debito, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, 9999999 as nro_cursograma_facturacion, (CASE when (W_V550_PRDU = 43 or W_V550_PRDU = 44 or W_V550_PRDU = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania, SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo_recepcion
FROM AMSPROVD.V550FDECAB C
JOIN AMSPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM
WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ?
and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('CMAN','DMAN','DMAC','CMAR') and W_V550_NPRO not in (7313, 47660)
and not (W_V550_NPRO = 48407 and (W_V550_NCOM =1209 or W_V550_NCOM = 1228) ) -- Descartan estos comprobantes ya que actuarian como anulacion de un DMAA erroneo que no contemplamos. Entonces, como no contemplamos anulados en Fact ni Deb Manuales, tampoco lo hacemos en Creditos aunque no tengamos el comprobante CMAA

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SqlServer v10; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

component.name: OLE DB Source

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property: SELECT 'O' as Origen_Refacturacion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_TIPR AS Tipo_Acreedor, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, W_V550_TALO AS Nro_Talonario, W_V550_TCOM AS Tipo_Comprobante, W_V550_NCOM AS Numero_Comprobante, W_V550_FCOM AS Fecha_Comprobante, W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, (CASE when W_V550_TCOM = 'CMAN' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, 1 as marca_procesado, (CASE when (W_V550_NPRO = 74902 or W_V550_NPRO = 53945 or W_V550_NPRO = 74134) then 'A' else 'X' end) as id_origen_debito, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, 9999999 as nro_cursograma_facturacion, (CASE when (W_V550_PRDU = 43 or W_V550_PRDU = 44 or W_V550_PRDU = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania, SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo_recepcion FROM OSPPROVD.V550FDECAB C JOIN OSPPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('CMAN','DMAN','DMAC','CMAR') and W_V550_NPRO not in (7313, 47660)

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

component.refId: Package\Debitos Creditos Manuales SMP\OLE DB Source
component.contactInfo: OLE DB Source;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;7
component.name: OLE DB Source

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property:
SELECT 'S' as Origen_Refacturacion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_TIPR AS Tipo_Acreedor, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, W_V550_TALO AS Nro_Talonario, W_V550_TCOM AS Tipo_Comprobante, W_V550_NCOM AS Numero_Comprobante, W_V550_FCOM AS Fecha_Comprobante, W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, (CASE when W_V550_TCOM = 'CMAN' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, 1 as marca_procesado, (CASE when (W_V550_NPRO = 74902 or W_V550_NPRO = 53945 or W_V550_NPRO = 74134) then 'A' else 'X' end) as id_origen_debito, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, 9999999 as nro_cursograma_facturacion, (CASE when (W_V550_PRDU = 43 or W_V550_PRDU = 44 or W_V550_PRDU = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania, SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo_recepcion
FROM SMPPROVD.V550FDECAB C JOIN SMPPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('CMAN','DMAN','DMAC','CMAR') and W_V550_NPRO not in (7313, 47660)

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property: SELECT 'T' as Origen_Refacturacion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_TIPR AS Tipo_Acreedor, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, W_V550_TALO AS Nro_Talonario, W_V550_TCOM AS Tipo_Comprobante, W_V550_NCOM AS Numero_Comprobante, W_V550_FCOM AS Fecha_Comprobante, W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, (CASE when W_V550_TCOM = 'CMAN' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, 1 as marca_procesado, (CASE when (W_V550_NPRO = 74902 or W_V550_NPRO = 53945 or W_V550_NPRO = 74134) then 'A' else 'X' end) as id_origen_debito, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, 9999999 as nro_cursograma_facturacion, 2 as id_compania, SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo_recepcion FROM STFPROVD.V550FDECAB C JOIN STFPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('CMAN','DMAN','DMAC','CMAR') and W_V550_NPRO not in (7313, 47660)

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
------ Periodo
----select 201806 as Periodo
select max(id_periodo) as Periodo from D_PERIODO where vigente_consumo = 1

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
------ Periodo Desde
----select '20180601' as Periodo_Desde
select top 1 CAST((dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(id_fecha))as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Desde from D_FECHA F JOIN D_PERIODO P on dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(F.id_fecha) = P.id_periodo where vigente_consumo = 1 order by id_fecha desc

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
----select '20180701' as Periodo_Hasta
select top 1 CAST(dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(DATEADD(month,1,id_fecha)) as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Hasta from D_FECHA F JOIN D_PERIODO P on dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(F.id_fecha) = P.id_periodo where vigente_consumo = 1 order by id_fecha desc
